alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Walker and east central Fayette Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 418 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Berry, or 13 miles south of Carbon Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Cordova, Berry, Parrish, Oakman, Sipsey, Curry, Boley Springs, Lynns Park, West Corona, Cedrum Area, Holly Grove, Powellville, Manchester, Gamble, Corona, Townley, Boldo and Walker County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and west central Alabama.
